trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SEQ_00<tab>Seigetsu the Enlightened would entrust you with a matter of some secrecy.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Namazu procurer.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken with the Namazu procurer. Deliver the requested supplies to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Namazu procurer.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have a special favor to ask of you. Our altar has frequent need of fresh offerings─fish, fruit, and the like─and we require your assistance in procuring replacements. But these must be no ordinary offerings...

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_001<tab>Our head procurer will provide you with the details of your task─you will find him absorbed in his work near the Path of the Craven. ...Oh, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Pray keep this request confidential, if you would.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_010<tab>Seigetsu sent you, yes, yes? Thank the Big One! I need an expert─a veteran in the field─to handle one of the more challenging aspects of the procurement.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_011<tab>To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality metal fish sculpture for our altar offerings. As convincingly real as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_012<tab>To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality imitation flower for our altar offerings. As convincingly real as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_013<tab>To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality hot pepper ball. As excruciatingly spicy as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_014<tab>To be more specific, I need you to mine some pieces of jade that could be mistaken for kusamochi─you know those green-colored rice cake treats? The all-knowing Seigetsu mentioned deposits are to be found to the east of Mol Iloh.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_015<tab>To be more specific, I need you to harvest some wild steppe radishes─I hear they feel like hot coals on your tongue. According to Seigetsu and his infallible research, such peppery vegetables can be found growing in the east of Mol Iloh.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_016<tab>To be more specific, I need you to locate some salmon roe and use it to catch me a spikefish from the waters of Azim Khaat. They say the locals usually cut this one free, seeing as it's more bone than fish...

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_017<tab>Once you have my request in order, please deliver it straight to Dhoro Iloh. I'll bring the rest to Seigetsu myself...if I ever manage to find everything on this infernal list.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_018<tab>As I said, feel free to raid my supply crate there if you find yourself lacking any materials. Pillage away!
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_019<tab>As I said, feel free to raid my supply crate there if you find yourself lacking any materials. Pillage away!
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_020<tab>As I said, feel free to raid my supply crate there if you find yourself lacking any materials. Pillage away!
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_028<tab>Once you have those jade pieces, I'd appreciate it if you could take them directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_029<tab>Once you have those steppe radishes, I'd appreciate it if you could take them directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_030<tab>Once you've caught that spikefish, I'd appreciate it if you could take it directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_DAILYNAMAZUO03120_000_031<tab>All set? Let's get our offerings to Seigetsu, and remember: not a word to anyone! No, no!
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_040<tab>You have my “special consignment”?
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_041<tab>Most excellent. You see, there is a reason we have needed to replace our altar offerings with such frequency. Shall I enlighten you as to why?
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_042<tab>Thieves. A certain number of ill-natured and gluttonous Namazu have been stuffing their faces with our festival fare.

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_043<tab>Thus did I requisition the creation of such offerings that would fill the bellies of these voracious vandals with naught but remorse. A civilized solution, do you not agree?

TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_044<tab>But even the average Namazu is unrepentant in his appetite! No matter how many are repulsed by our culinary artifice, there will always be another tempted by the prospect of a surreptitious snack! We must stand ready to restock our supply...
TEXT_BANNAM506_03120_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
